title: Scheduler policy was deprecated in 1.12, how to extend scheduler?
body:
Scheduler policy was deprecated in 1.12? How can I use HTTP extender?
```
o.Deprecated.AddFlags(fs, &o.ComponentConfig)
```

https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/design-proposals/scheduling/scheduler_extender.md

We need to extend scheduler badly...

title: Update embargo doc link in SECURITY_CONTACTS and change PST to PSC
